text:
Some needed wisdumb from Rumi for the times we are in: "Raise your words, not your voice. It is rain that grows flowers, not thunder"

#quote #FridayMotivation #FridayThoughts #COVID19 #CapitolBuilding #TrumpTreason #BidenHarris #Mindfulness #vaccine #pandemic #Inauguration2021 https://t.co/CR4RR4b6JF
